about_the_game:
Skyway's Dash mechanic allows you to reach places not normally accessible with standard movement controls. For more height, you can grab ledges and climb your way to victory! Combining these two controls gives you total control over the movement of your character, and you'll be expected to use them in unexpected ways to score a fast time and complete challenges.

This world is filled with many dangers. You'll be dodging missiles, avoiding obstacles, and eliminating drones to reach the goal!


  • Challenge your brain with a series of puzzles designed to stump you
  • Test your reflexes by avoiding enemies, timing jumps, and grabbing ledges
  • Support for the XBox One and Playstation 4 Controllers
  • Native versions for Mac OSX, Windows, and Linux
  • 4k resolution support and runs over 60FPS
  • A comprehensive statistics system allows you to compete for death-less runs, fastest runs, and any other self-imposed challenge


You find yourself thrown into a strange world, where your only friend is a robotic companion who's quickly running out of charge. You must find a new power source to keep your drone alive and fight with everything you have to persist against the hardships you'll encounter.

A threatening presence lurks over the land, watching your every move. Defeat the menace and solve the mystery to discover the true origin of this tale!
detailed_description:
Skyway's Dash mechanic allows you to reach places not normally accessible with standard movement controls. For more height, you can grab ledges and climb your way to victory! Combining these two controls gives you total control over the movement of your character, and you'll be expected to use them in unexpected ways to score a fast time and complete challenges.

This world is filled with many dangers. You'll be dodging missiles, avoiding obstacles, and eliminating drones to reach the goal!


  • Challenge your brain with a series of puzzles designed to stump you
  • Test your reflexes by avoiding enemies, timing jumps, and grabbing ledges
  • Support for the XBox One and Playstation 4 Controllers
  • Native versions for Mac OSX, Windows, and Linux
  • 4k resolution support and runs over 60FPS
  • A comprehensive statistics system allows you to compete for death-less runs, fastest runs, and any other self-imposed challenge


You find yourself thrown into a strange world, where your only friend is a robotic companion who's quickly running out of charge. You must find a new power source to keep your drone alive and fight with everything you have to persist against the hardships you'll encounter.

A threatening presence lurks over the land, watching your every move. Defeat the menace and solve the mystery to discover the true origin of this tale!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @1.6GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 or Higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @3.2GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 5.0 or Higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @1.6GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2/Shader Model 3.0 or Higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @3.2GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1/Shader Model 5.0 or Higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Skyway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @1.6GHz or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/AMD Ryzen 5 @3.2GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Skyway is a third person puzzle-platformer set in an abstract universe! Jump, Climb, and Dash your way through an increasingly difficult fortress in the sky! Solve the puzzles, score the fastest time, and challenge yourself to master the controls!
